text: Jerry Collins (4 November 1980 - 5 June 2015) was a professional New Zealand rugby union player. He played for the All Blacks between 2001 and 2007. At the time of his death, he was playing for RC Narbonne. He also played for the Hurricanes, Wellington, Toulon, Ospreys, Yamaha Júbilo. Collins was born in Apia, Samoa. He grew up in Porirua, Wellington. He and his partner, Alana, had a daughter, Ayla. Collins and his partner were killed in a car accident on 5 June 2015 near Béziers, Hérault in southern France. He was 34. His three- month-old daughter was badly injured and was flown to a Montpellier hospital. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jerry Collins at AllBlacks.com Category:1980 births Category:2015 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Wellington Category:RC Toulonnais players Category:Road accident deaths
title: Jerry Collins
